title: Community-Based Learning (CBL) Program to Strengthen Preservice Mathematics Teachers' Problem-Solving Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Building a collaborative learning environment for practicing elementary school teachers to solve real-life problems.

learning_goals: Learners can design and execute mathematics problem-solving strategies based on real-world community issues.
Learners can systematically reflect on problem-solving processes through collaboration with peer teachers and community members.
Learners can produce project outcomes that apply theoretical knowledge to actual classroom contexts.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
